install.name: JS_Elated
install.author: Casey Lee for Joomlashack
install.copyright: Copyright Simple Themes LLC 2010. All rights reserved
install.license: Commercial license - single domain use only
install.description: Thank you for purchasing JS Elated from Joomlashack

param.name: headertype
param.label: Header Type
param.description: Header display method: Image should be 32-bit transparent PNG or must match body background image.

param.name: menuposition
param.label: Menu Position
param.description: Display your main menu next to the logo or below the logo. This option is useful for larger logos or for menus that contain more menu items.

param.name: item_spacing
param.label: Menu Item Spacing
param.description: padding (in px) between menu items

param.name: logo
param.label: Logo Image
param.description: If you chose to display a graphic header (above), you can select your logo from the images directory after you upload the image.

param.name: header_width
param.label: Logo Width (px)
param.description: Logo Width (when header style = image)

param.name: header_height
param.label: Logo Height (px)
param.description: Logo Height (when header style = image

param.name: header_top_pad
param.label: Logo Padding-Top
param.description: Adds margin to the top of your logo

param.name: header_bot_pad
param.label: Logo Padding-Bottom
param.description: Adds margin to the bottom of your logo

param.name: header_left_pad
param.label: Logo Padding-Left
param.description: Adds margin to the left of your logo

param.name: header_right_pad
param.label: Logo Padding-Right
param.description: Adds margin to the right of your logo

param.name: headline
param.label: Site Title
param.description: The site title is rendered for SEO purposes so it is important to customize this regardless of 'text' or 'graphic' Header Mode (configured above).

param.name: tagline
param.label: Tagline
param.description: The site description is rendered for SEO purposes so it is important to custommize this regardless of 'text' or 'graphic' Header Mode (configured above).

param.name: style
param.label: Template Color Style
param.description: Select which of the style variations you wish to use.

param.name: header_font
param.label: Heading Font
param.description: Select the default font face for the headers

param.name: body_font
param.label: Body Font
param.description: Select the default font face for the body

param.name: columns
param.label: Columns
param.description: You can set the default widths and arrange the main columns. Any columns that are unused will just be hidden and the main column will be widened.

param.name: headerscript
param.label: Header Script
param.description: If you need to add scripts to your header (like Google verification code, perhaps), you should enter them here.

param.name: footerscript
param.label: Footer Script
param.description: If you need to add scripts to your footer (like Google Analytics tracking code), you should enter them here.

param.name: rebrand
param.label: Remove Branding
param.description: Our templates come with some branding. If you wish to remove it please purchase the rights to remove our branding by clicking on the link provided before disabling it here. Rebranding is handled as an honor system, we don't monitor or verify if you have purchased it, so please be respectful of our licensing terms.

param.name: mootools
param.label: Enable Mootools
param.description: Turn off Joomla core Mootools.js. This will speed up yor site if you are not using frontend editing features.
